articles.title: Google gets EU antitrust charges on ad tech business - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Margrethe Vestager says search giant ‘may have abused its dominant position.’
articles.content: Google may need to sell off part of its advertising business to prevent it from abusing its dominant position in the market and shutting out competitors, the European Commission said Wednesday as it … [+2871 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Ukrainian Flag Flies Over Village Liberated In Counteroffensive - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: Journalists were given access to the newly liberated Ukrainian village of Neskuchne on June 13, confirming that Kyiv's forces have made modest gains in the early phase of their counteroffensive against Moscow's forces.
articles.content: Journalists were given access to the newly liberated Ukrainian village of Neskuchne on June 13, confirming that Kyiv's forces have made modest gains in the early phase of their counteroffensive again… [+18 chars]

articles.title: ESA - BepiColombo braces for third Mercury flyby - European Space Agency
articles.description: The ESA/JAXA BepiColombo mission is gearing up for its next close flyby of Mercury on 19 June, when it will pass the planet’s surface at an altitude of about 236 km.
